channel.title: [CreativeX] - Eco | PvP | PvM | Need staff
channel.description:
[center][img]http://i49.tinypic.com/1el3bk.jpg[/img][/center]
Forums www.CreativeXForum.tk
Client download https://www.dropbox.com/s/7d6yjl1mpfw4z5z/client.jar
We strive to create a friendly gaming for players. Our goals focus on keeping the community happy. Money is not the main importance the community is.
CreativeX isn't currently a 24/7 server however we are hoping on getting enough donations for a 24/7 VPS once we have done this I can guarantee that the server will continue to grow and hopefully one day become a game that is on the first page of RSPS voting websites.
- Unique Gameplay - Hours of fun - PvP - PvM - Many minigames - loads of bosses - Good economy - Friendly staff
Please don't come in the server JUST to try to get staff you have to earn staff just like you do on any other server loyalty helpfulness good manners and good knowledge will gain you a spot in our staff roster
Note: Not currently 24/7, need donations for vps
Here are just a small percentage of pictures from our server! ---
[center][img]http://i49.tinypic.com/2hz00eg.png[/img][/center]
[size=14pt].... Login screen![/size]
[center][img]http://i45.tinypic.com/315fv40.png[/img][/center]
[center][img]http://i47.tinypic.com/29ok295.png[/img][/center]
[size=14pt].... And many more classes! [/size]
[center][img]http://i50.tinypic.com/2dh92d4.png[/img][/center]
[size=14pt]...Many teleports and areas to explore![/size]
[center][img]http://i46.tinypic.com/2ce2btu.png[/img][/center]
[size=14pt]...Lot's of bosses to fight w/ the correct drops![/size]
[center][img]http://i47.tinypic.com/2montyo.png[/img][/center]
[size=14pt]...Unique donor shop and donor benefits![/size]

[center][/center]

Client download

Dropbox

Dropbox - Error

Dropbox is a free service that lets you bring your photos, docs, and videos anywhere and share them easily. Never email yourself a file again!

We strive to create a friendly gaming for players.
Our goals focus on keeping the community happy.
Money is not the main importance the community is.

CreativeX isn’t currently a 24/7 server however we are hoping on getting enough donations for a 24/7 VPS once we have done this I can guarantee that the server will continue to grow and hopefully one day become a game that is on the first page of RSPS voting websites.

  • Unique Gameplay
  • Hours of fun
  • PvP
  • PvM
  • Many minigames
  • loads of bosses
  • Good economy
  • Friendly staff

Please don’t come in the server JUST to try to get staff you have to earn staff just like you do on any other server loyalty helpfulness good manners and good knowledge will gain you a spot in our staff roster

Note: Not currently 24/7, need donations for vps
